articles.description: INTERNATIONAL call-ups are certain to force the postponement of Wanderers' home game against Portsmouth later this month.
articles.content:
PORTSMOUTH boss Danny Cowley believes it will be impossible to fulfil their forthcoming game at Wanderers because of international call-ups.
EFL rules state that a club can request the postponement … [+995 chars]
